data.text:
Good morning! Thanks to everyone who participated in our quiz! This time most of you (43%) guessed right - airBaltic was the world’s first airline to sell cars on board. 🚗🚘
Have a wonderful week!
@JoLeevers Currently flights are scheduled to be performed as planned. However, please know that entry rules and travel restrictions can change on a very short notice.

@AntoineHron Hello Antoine! Thank you for reaching out to us. We’re sorry to hear of this. As your reservation was made via travel agency, we kindly advise to contact them in regards to your refund. We also advise to delete your tweet, as it contains sensitive data (booking reference number).

urls.title: Cheap flights to Baltics, Europe & Middle East | airBaltic
urls.description: Buy cheap flights to the Baltics, Middle East and Europe online today from airBaltic. We fly to 70+ destinations from Riga, Vilnius and Tallinn.

data.text: @JoLeevers Hello! Thank you for reaching out to us. Please know the current flight schedule is available on https://t.co/YZH2a4156m.

Another week is coming to an end and it’s #airBalticQuiz time! During these 25 years airBaltic has reached many milestones. airBaltic was the world’s first airline to sell very extravagant product on board the flights. 🤩 Can you guess the product type? 🤔

Last year we participated in Airbus A220 tour around the Pacific Region! #DidYouKnow that during this tour we visited nine destinations in seven countries? The aircraft showcasing was performed in Australia, New Zealand, New Caledonia, Papua New Guinea, Cambodia and India. https://t.co/JRhtOtiWaD

data.text: @thekukosa Labdien! Reisus uz Atēnām veicām vasaras sezonā, kas ir noslēgusies. Ziemas lidojumu grafiks iekļauj tādus slēpošanas galamērķus kā Kitile, Minhene, Zalcburga un daudzus citus. Savienosim Rīgu arī ar vairākiem saulainiem atpūtas galamērķiem, ja to ļaus epidemioloģiskā situācija.

Thanks for participating in our weekly quiz! This time only 26% of you got the answer right. The total length of snowmobile routes in Kittila is 900 km. You can book flights to Kittila now via our web page and experience the winter adventure yourself! ❄⛄ https://t.co/wQMnzzp7UZ

urls.title: Cheap flights to Baltics, Europe & Middle East | airBaltic
urls.description: Buy cheap flights to the Baltics, Middle East and Europe online today from airBaltic. We fly to 70+ destinations from Riga, Vilnius and Tallinn.

data.text: @sevill_patricia Hello! Currently we are not planning to perform direct flights to/from Spain. For more information we kindly invite you to check our webpage https://t.co/Zibba9Nx4A!
@yourbakaloli Hello! If you have carefully packed it, then we do not see any issues. More information regarding cabin baggage: https://t.co/I8zWogbYlE

urls.title: Change your flight | airBaltic
urls.description: For peace of mind, it's best to be completely prepared before your flight. However, if you have been a little bit careless, there are additional options available.

data.text: @yourbakaloli Hello! If you want to change the date of travel for the Green class ticket, it costs 50 EUR per direction, per ticket + the cost of the fare difference, if applicable. For more information, we kindly invite you to visit our web page : https://t.co/IVC41C11pP

A very cozy autumn day here in Riga and it’s time for #airBalticQuiz! This week we announced new safe winter destination – Kittila. Can you guess the total length of snowmobile routes in the municipality of Kittila? ⛷️

urls.title: Frequently asked question about airBaltic
urls.description: We're here to help you! Helpful answers to your questions and useful contacts to find out everything you need about your flight.

data.text:
@johnbar34372405 Hello, John! Unfortunately it is not possible to prolong the validity of the Gift Voucher. For more details you may contact our Reservations department: https://t.co/9ZLiOgN2eR 
Thank you!

@Brinumsvecite Hello, Marta. Our apologies for this unpleasant situation. May we ask you to clarify your tweet? Has your bag been already located and now has been passed to the courier services? Thanks.

Last year, we were very proud to welcome our 21st A220-300 - the 100th manufactured @Airbus aircraft of this type. And now this aircraft has a special design! If you've already spotted it, share your photo with us! https://t.co/KCoSKJAxil

data.text: @HavasGH @TAVairports Thank you for the nice visit today! 😊🎂 https://t.co/J3V4BZdlQY
@HavasGH Thank you dear colleagues! Reaching this milestone wouldn't have been possible without you! 💚

#DidYouKnow that we're proudly carrying our well-recognizable livery with the lime-green tail and name "Baltic" on it for 16 years? It was introduced on October 2004 and has been updated few times since then. https://t.co/Ppg6aw73zP

urls.title: Travelling with pets | airBaltic
urls.description: Find useful information on making the journey comfortable for your pet (and for your peace of mind).

data.text: @kseniasejenkova Hi! It is not allowed to bring pets into the cabin (as hand luggage), except for service dogs when flying with us from London. For more details please check: https://t.co/4ftIZTuzLP

data.text: @phoebebrannick Hi! If your booking was made via the travel agency unfortunately we won’t be able to directly assist with this as it is their responsibility to refund passenger. If additional information is needeed from us all the travel agencies have our helpdesk contacts available. Thank you.

Get ready to polish your skis and explore winter wonderland as we are adding new and exciting destination to our winter schedule - Kittilä in Finland! Book your travel ✈️ https://t.co/wQMnzzp7UZ and check travel restrictions before it 👉 https://t.co/67jWDQXz0Y https://t.co/swooqYlNPJ

data.text:
✈️ Here's our #HowItStarted #HowItsGoing - 1995 vs 2020.

From twin-engine turboprop with just 33 seats to proud carrier operating only world’s greenest commercial aircraft @Airbus A220-300 😎 https://t.co/041PzAwzoA

Good morning! ☀️ Thanks to all the participants! More than three quarters of you got it right - currently airBaltic perform its flights to/from Berlin-Tegel Airport (TXL). See you in the remaining flights there! ✈️

@serene_euphoria @LV_CAA Labdien! Šobrīd tiešos lidojumus no Maskavas uz Rīgu plānots atsākt 25.oktobrī. Tomēr vienlaikus aicinām ņemt vērā, ka saistībā ar vīrusa attīstību un valdību ierobežojumiem grafikā iespējamas izmaiņas. Paldies.

Weekend is almost here meaning it's time for new #airBalticQuiz! 💡
airBaltic is planning to start its operations to the new Berlin Brandenburg Airport on November 8th. However, do you know to which airport in Berlin we are performing flights right now? ✈️
@elvee2017 Labdien! Nē, uz šo brīdi pašizolācija joprojām ierodoties no Lietuvas ir jāievēro. E-pastā tika pieļauta kļūda, kas tiks labota - jau tūlīt izsūtīsim labojumu.
@K_Karlis @SPKCentrs Labdien! Nē, uz šo brīdi pašizolācija joprojām ierodoties no Jūsu minētajām valstīm ir jāievēro. E-pastā tika pieļauta kļūda, kas tiks labota - jau tūlīt izsūtīsim labojumu.
@human_0_1 Labvakar! Lūdzam privāti DM ziņā atsūtīt sīkākas detaļas, kā arī rezervācijas numuru, pārbaudīsim! Paldies.

Flight attendant uniforms focus on comfort and safety, but they’re also a very important element of an airline’s identity. #DidYouKnow that since founding in 1995 airBaltic has had 7 styles of uniform designs? Here are some of them! https://t.co/DZZmzNMbAN

urls.description: Buy cheap flights to the Baltics, Middle East and Europe online today from airBaltic. We fly to 70+ destinations from Riga, Vilnius and Tallinn.

data.text: @supreme_rus Hello! If you are referring to airBaltic app (and not the "Apturi Covid" app) then currently we do not have a timeframe as when it may be available. We kindly invite you to use our mobile optimised website https://t.co/GfcUoxzmDg from your smart device!

@mbarinskis @Sat_Min airBaltic lidojumos uz vienu pasažiera kilometru tiek radīti 95 grami CO2. Ja lidojuma pasažieri izvēlētos Kurzemes piekrasti apskatīt ar auto, CO2 izmeši bieži būtu augstāki, taču ceļojuma pieredze un redzētās ainavas mazāk unikālas.
@mbarinskis @Sat_Min Labdien! Lidojuma organizētāji ir ceļojumu aģentūra.

@Kaspars_Zn airBaltic lidojumos uz vienu pasažiera kilometru tiek radīti 95 grami CO2. Ja lidojuma pasažieri izvēlētos Kurzemes piekrasti apskatīt ar auto, CO2 izmeši bieži būtu augstāki, taču ceļojuma pieredze un redzētās ainavas mazāk unikālas.
@Kaspars_Zn Labdien! Lidojuma organizētāji ir ceļojumu aģentūra.

@AliseKruu @Cepuritis_E Lidojuma organizētāji ir ceļojumu aģentūra. airBaltic lidojumos uz vienu pasažiera kilometru tiek radīti 95 grami CO2. Ja lidojuma pasažieri izvēlētos Kurzemes piekrasti apskatīt ar auto, CO2 izmeši bieži būtu augstāki, taču ceļojuma pieredze un redzētās ainavas mazāk unikālas.

As of today all passengers must fill an online questionnaire before their arrival to Latvia at https://t.co/X5OjjXCC96
It is mandatory for all travellers, and must be completed no earlier than 48 hours before crossing the border of Latvia. 
More: https://t.co/M8YxZKhcm2 https://t.co/YFfCFHTA9F

No šodienas visiem pasažieriem, ierodoties Latvijā, jāaizpilda tiešsaistes anketa vietnē https://t.co/RwCIPMhWWu
Šīs anketas aizpildīšana ir obligāta – to nepieciešams veikt ne ātrāk kā 48 stundas pirms Latvijas robežas šķērsošanas.
Sīkāk: https://t.co/ewziBoOvY5 https://t.co/0eS8liCKEZ

Thanks to everyone who participated in #airBalticQuiz! 52% of you got the right answer - the first issue of our inflight magazine Baltic Outlook was published in 1999! 😊 
Have a wonderful week! 👋
@karlis_serzants Labvakar, Kārli! Atvainojamies par šo situāciju. Lai noskaidrotu vairāk detaļu par Jūsu rezervāciju, aicinām sazināties ar mums privāti.
@BaibaZiga Good evening Baiba! Thank you for letting us know this. We’ll be glad to pass this wonderful feedback to our colleagues! 🤗
@tomasslakotko1 Labdien! Paldies, esam atbilējuši!

Hello Friday! 👋 It’s  #airBalticQuiz time! This week we would like to check your knowledge about our Baltic Outlook magazine! Do you know when was the first Baltic Outlook inflight magazine published? 😊📰
@liana_langa Labvakar, Liāna. Pasažieri aicinām sazināties ar mums privāti, norādot rezervācijas numuru - informāciju pārbaudīsim. Paldies!

We are very excited to launch an internal talent leadership program airBaltic Leaders for Future (ALFA). The new program has been created to accelerate potential of @airBaltic professionals as future leaders of the company and industry. Read more: https://t.co/ftem3YaFH6 https://t.co/PAtm8aUAlU
@HelsinkiAirport Thank you! 🥳🎉

@gatis_r Labdien, Gati! Šobrīd mūsu Zvanu centrs ir diezgan noslogots, tomēr lielākā daļa pasažieru mūsu aģentus sazvana. Atvainojamies par sagādātajām neērtībām un aicinām zvanīt vēlreiz nedaudz vēlāk. Pateicamies par sapratni!

urls.title: Travel regulations | airBaltic
urls.description: Your guide to getting the right information about travel documentation and up-to-date travel requirements.

data.text: @shinnotes Hello! Please know that entry rules in each country are different and still subject to change on a short notice. Currently you do not need PCR test when you are only transiting through Riga airport. More information: https://t.co/QIoNeWjHbT

@instant_mk Labdien! Ēdienkartes papīrs ir speciāli izvēlēts, ņemot vērā klientu pieredzi un tās nokļūšanas procesu no izstrādes līdz pasniegšanai uz borta. Šīs vienreizējās lietošanas ēdienkartes tiek izsniegtas tikai pasažieriem, kuri to vēlas.

Ambition, vision, energy, drive to move, go forward and never give up - @airBaltic and its CEO have many traits in common. Read the special interview with Martin Gauss @Gaussm - this month we are celebrating airline's 25th anniversary: https://t.co/IllOG7hjnj https://t.co/WBDTkqajsC
@kevinjia1122 Thank you very much Kevin! 🥳🎉
@ChopinAirport Thank you! Greetings from Riga! 🥳🎉

This month we are celebrating our 25th birthday! #Didyouknow that 25 years ago, on October 1, our first commercial flight was from Riga to Stockholm? It was operated with the Saab SF340 aircraft which has 33 seats. https://t.co/AmQNUQbdki

We're incredibly excited to celebrate @airBaltic 25th anniversary! 🥳️ We wanted to share the 25 years full of wonderful memories with you with a special Baltic Outlook magazine! Read it here https://t.co/14CLTVDH9k or collect your personal copy on board. https://t.co/i4E5yMANxU
@AivarsTennisUK Hi! Thanks for your interest! Keep following our social media channels for the latest updates about our fleet 😎
Thanks for participating! 79% of you got the right answer - the registration number of an aircraft with the colors of the Latvian national flag is YL-CSL! 🇱🇻 We wish you a pleasant week!😊
@misalpaav Hello! May we kindly ask you to send us more details privately - via a direct message? Thank you!

It's another Friday with #airBalticQuiz! This time we will test your knowledge about our special livery! 😊 Do you know what registration number does aircraft with Latvian national flag livery have? ✈️🇱🇻
@MayuriBabaji @Lufthansa_India Hello! Please contact us privately in direct message, we will check this case. Thank you.

Sustainability is an integral part of our daily life and future, and it is not only about clean air - at @airBaltic, we are focusing on environmental, economic and social sustainability. Learn more in our annual sustainability report published today: https://t.co/GWW4KNSwXD https://t.co/zuOPkHHpR8

Our Information Technology department is seeking for bright minds. If you love solving challenges and a dynamic environment around you, join our team and bring your career to new heights with @airBaltic! ✈️
Check the latest vacancies: https://t.co/FC1Xs5UhJM https://t.co/UQKCU9mzTY

data.text: You probably have already seen our aircraft with 3 special Baltic liveries. However #DidYouKnow that each was created by 15 painters using 250 litres of primer, paint, and clearcoat? It took a total of 3000 hours to complete them. https://t.co/Cc05VuKMfs

Good morning! ☀️Thanks to everyone who participated in #airBalticQuiz! Almost 60% got the right answer - the official start date of this year's aviation winter season is October 25! Have a wonderful week! 👋
@femLENSphoto Hello! May we kindly ask you to send us more details privately - via direct message? Thank you!
@airports_hotels Spot on! 👍

Friday is here! It's #airBalticQuiz time!
Although there are still some warm days ahead, in aviation winter season is slowly approaching. 🏔 Do you know when it starts this year? ✈️
@Jaspincairn1 @Airbus @riga_airport Good morning! As of today, flights on this route have not yet been resumed.

urls.title: Cancel your flight | airBaltic
urls.description: Get more information about: refund options depending on the ticket type you have purchased or are planning to purchase; our sickness warranty option; and travel insurance.

data.text: @deleugyn Hello! We do understand your disappointment, however in case if your flight is scheduled to be performed as planned and you would like to cancel it, currently it can be done according to the fare rules of the purchased ticket: https://t.co/HQ1tsTHg7P

#DidYouKnow that NATO phonetic alphabet is the most commonly used spelling dictionary in the aviation industry? The alphabet assigns code words to all of the letters in the English alphabet so that combinations of letters can be easily understood! https://t.co/jixZY3q8oD

domain.name: Political Body
domain.description: A section of a government, like The Supreme Court

data.text: @triplemoontrvls Thanks for your kind words, glad we could bring some clarity on this for you! Have a nice day!

urls.title: Cheap flights to Baltics, Europe & Middle East | airBaltic
urls.description: Buy cheap flights to the Baltics, Middle East and Europe online today from airBaltic. We fly to 70+ destinations from Riga, Vilnius and Tallinn.

data.text: @triplemoontrvls If your ticket was purchased on our webpage https://t.co/GfcUoxzmDg, you can see this information in the reservation confirmation e-mail as advised. If your ticket was purchased via the travel agency, we are not able to comment as when or how do they display this information.

@triplemoontrvls Reservation class can be seen on the ticket confirmation e-mail (screenshot as an example). Please also note that as advised in our first tweet, fare difference is calculated from the global reservation system and not the webpage. Thank you! https://t.co/eaEgXsJByD
@triplemoontrvls Regarding the "secret subclasses", they are not that secret and standard in aviation as how the tickets are sold: https://t.co/UfF0vT4N9P

@triplemoontrvls Hello, Jess. When passenger would like to request the flight change, the exact change conditions depend on the ticket type booked. If you are referring to the fare difference then it is calculated from the global reservation system between the old and new reservation class.

Now more convenient and environmentally friendly –  our loyalty travel programme airBaltic Club introduces digital member cards📱 Read more about out the programme and download the digital card to your mobile wallet here 👉https://t.co/Y0yuBLK769 https://t.co/xNgmwPMIEv

We are excited to welcome and congratulate the eighth group of airBaltic Pilot Academy students! These 11 students have already started their studies and in less than two years they will receive a commercial pilot licence. Read more: https://t.co/PpIjyRGN0V https://t.co/b9NWUBYurp

Thanks to everyone for participating - the vote was really close, however in the end 39% of you got the right answer - although Reykjavík may seem like the right answer, Lisbon is our most furthest route from Riga currently with distance of 3142 km! 🇵🇹 https://t.co/W8qTwDS8ck

urls.title: Cancel your flight | airBaltic
urls.description: Get more information about: refund options depending on the ticket type you have purchased or are planning to purchase; our sickness warranty option; and travel insurance.

data.text: @MelanieDiSil Hello! Unfortunately we do not understand your tweet without the context, however if you requested to cancel the flight while it was still scheduled, it was done according to your ticket fare rules: https://t.co/HQ1tsTHg7P

urls.title: Visbiežāk uzdotie jautājumi - sazinies ar mums | airBaltic
urls.description: Meklē atbildes uz interesējošiem jautājumiem un atrodi noderīgus kontaktus, lai varētu ar mums sazināties neskaidrību gadījumā. Mēs ar prieku palīdzēsim!

data.text:
@tuommu Labdien! Kā jau minējām, lielā noslogojuma dēļ Covid krīzes iespaidā atbilde uz e-pastiem var aizņemt ilgāku laiku kā ierasts - līdz pat vairākām nedēļām. Mūsu visi kontakttālruņi atrodami šeit: https://t.co/CHGjV15S1F
Paldies!
@ptitbow Hello! Please DM us privately more details about your reservation.

We are happy to announce that we have accepted our 23rd @Airbus A220-300 jet, registered as YL-AAW. The green-tailed beauty flew directly from factory in Montreal and touched down in @riga_airport earlier this morning. https://t.co/xfeuxEkqWo

@tuommu Saprotam Jūsu sarūgtinājumu, taču vēlamies informēt, ka lielā noslogojuma dēļ atbilde uz e-pastiem var aizņemt ilgāku laiku kā ierasts.
Attiecībā uz zvaniem, visiem mūsu pasažieriem rezervācijas apstiprinājuma e-pastā norādīts arī parastā tarifa tālruņa numurs. Paldies.

urls.title: Visbiežāk uzdotie jautājumi - sazinies ar mums | airBaltic
urls.description: Meklē atbildes uz interesējošiem jautājumiem un atrodi noderīgus kontaktus, lai varētu ar mums sazināties neskaidrību gadījumā. Mēs ar prieku palīdzēsim!

data.text: @tuommu Labdien! Dāvanu karšu termiņu pagarināšana piedāvāta netiek, taču konkrētā gadījuma sakarā varam ieteikt sazināties ar mūsu Rezervāciju departamentu. https://t.co/CHGjV1nsTd

@carysoldall Hi! As advised in our previous reply, we kindly invite you to contact our Reservations department for the latest and current updates! We thank for your patience in this extraordinary situation for aviation.

urls.title: Veikt maksājumu | Papildpakalpojumi | airBaltic

@AivarsTennisUK @davepotter89 😎🎉

data.text: @evansinloughor Hello! If your flights were booked via the travel agent we kindly invite you to contact it for more details and updates on your refund request. If needed, agency can contact us via the helpdesk as well. Thank you for the patience.

@didziskrumins Labdien! Lūdzam DM ziņā privāti atsūtīt sīkākas detaļas par iegādātajiem lidojumiem, tostarp pasažieru vārdus/uzvārdus, maršrutu, datumus/laikus, e-pasta adresi, kā arī ekrānšāviņu no internetbankas par konkrēto transakciju. Pārbaudīsim, paldies!

#DidYouKnow that back when airBaltic just had four aircraft in its disposal, they were named after the four historical regions of Latvia – Zemgale, Latgale, Vidzeme and Kurzeme. https://t.co/FLhz0H06Si
@Janamaja Labdien un paldies par informēšanu! Nodosim Jūsu tvītu tehniskajai komandai sīkākai izpētei.
@m3ihring Good morning! We have provided answer on this to you via Facebook Messenger. Thank you!

data.text: @travelguy1179 Hello! If your scheduled flight is to Riga, our cabin crew will also have the forms on hand, however we kindly advise you (if possible) to print out the form by yourself and submit all the asked information on it before the flight for your own convenience. Thank you!
@_multilingirl_ If you have already submitted us a claim already via this form, may we ask for the case number as well as booking reference number (privately in DM message)? Thank you.

urls.title: Submit a claim | Contact us | airBaltic
urls.description: Left your belongings on the plane? Was your baggage delayed? You can submit a claim about baggage, flight irregularities and more to airBaltic online.

data.text: @_multilingirl_ Good evening! Sorry to hear about such unpleasant situation, our apologies. We kindly invite you to submit us a claim in this case and our Customer Relations department will investigate this case as what could be the reason and all the circumstances: https://t.co/N04NoZd2An
@kjackson1984 Please DM us your booking reference number as well as what issues exactly you experience, we will check whether we can assist via Twitter on this. Thank you!
